Package snowbound.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    A general interface for the various types of actions.
    Positionable
    Positionable things have a position.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI
    The base class for AIs.
    Base
    The state of a base at a specific turn, including the position, coverage, and owner.
    CaptureAction
    A simple action which represents the act of capturing a base.
    Entity<E>
    An entity is equivalent to itself regardless of the turn.
    GatherAction
    A simple action which represents the act of gathering snow from the ground.
    MoveAction
    An action representing the movement of a unit to a target position.
    Pathfinding
    A breadth-first search pathfinder.
    Position
    A raw hexgrid coordinate, using axial coordinates.
    ShoutAction
    What would BonzAI be without the capability shout?
    SpawnAction
    An action representing a unit spawning on the map.
    Team
    The state of a team at a specific turn, including the spawn locations, color, and score.
    ThrowAction
    An action representing the throwing a snowball to a target position.
    Tile
    The state of a tile at a specific turn, including the position and snow amount.
    Turn
    A snapshot in time at the current turn.
    Unit
    The state of a unit at a specific turn, including the team, perk, position, warmth, and number of snowballs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    The possible colors associated with each team.
    Direction
    Represents the six primary directions in a hexgrid, and their (x, y) coordinate offsets for moving in those directions.
    Perk
    The possible perks a unit can be spawned with.
    Stat
    The stats a unit has, and the default value of that stat for all units.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Agent
    An annotation specifying that the given class is an agent to be read by the competition software.
